member.name: T:XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxIcon

member.summary: The message box contains no symbols.

member.name: F:XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxIcon.Error
member.summary: The message box contains a symbol consisting of white X in a circle with a red background.

member.summary: The message box contains a symbol consisting of a white X in a circle with a red background.

member.summary: The message box contains a symbol consisting of white X in a circle with a red background.

member.name: F:XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxIcon.Question
member.summary: The message box contains a symbol consisting of a question mark in a circle.

member.name: F:XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxIcon.Exclamation
member.summary: The message box contains a symbol consisting of an exclamation point in a triangle with a yellow background.

member.name: F:XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxIcon.Warning
member.summary: The message box contains a symbol consisting of an exclamation point in a triangle with a yellow background.

member.name: F:XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxIcon.Information
member.summary: The message box contains a symbol consisting of a lowercase letter i in a circle.

member.name: F:XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxIcon.Asterisk
member.summary: The message box contains a symbol consisting of a lowercase letter i in a circle.

member.name: F:XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxIcon.UserIcon
member.summary: The message box contains a user-defined icon.

member.summary: Aligned to active monitor's left border

member.name: F:XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxVerticalAlign.BottomAligned

member.name: T:XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxEditControlStyles
member.summary: Styles that can be applied to the Input Text control shown in MessageBox dialog. These are Windows ES_ constants.

member.name: F:XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxEditControlStyles.None
member.summary: All default

member.name: F:XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxEditControlStyles.AutoHScroll
member.summary: Automatically scrolls text to the right by 10 characters when the user types a character at the end of the line.

member.name: F:XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxEditControlStyles.AutoVScroll
member.summary: Automatically scrolls text up one page when the user presses the ENTER key on the last line.

member.name: F:XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxEditControlStyles.Center
member.summary: Centers text.

member.name: F:XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxEditControlStyles.Lowercase
member.summary: Converts all characters to lowercase as they are typed into the edit control.

member.name: F:XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxEditControlStyles.Multiline
member.summary: Designates a multiline edit control.

member.name: F:XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxEditControlStyles.NoHideSel
member.summary: The selected text is inverted, even if the control does not have the focus.

member.name: F:XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxEditControlStyles.Number
member.summary: Allows only digits to be entered into the edit control.

member.name: F:XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxEditControlStyles.OemConvert
member.summary: Converts text entered in the edit control.

member.name: F:XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxEditControlStyles.Password
member.summary: Displays an asterisk (*) for each character typed into the edit control.

member.name: F:XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxEditControlStyles.ReadOnly
member.summary: Prevents the user from typing or editing text in the edit control.

member.name: F:XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxEditControlStyles.Right
member.summary: Right-aligns text.

member.name: F:XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxEditControlStyles.Uppercase
member.summary: Converts all characters to uppercase as they are typed into the edit control.

member.name: F:XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxEditControlStyles.WantReturn
member.summary: Specifies that a carriage return be inserted when the user presses the ENTER key while entering text into a multiline edit control in a dialog box.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.ResetBackColor(XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxBackground)
member.summary: Paints the background of the dialog or one dialog's child window using OS default color.
member.remarks: Default color scheme for the MessageBox varies across Windows versions. It can also be affected by user-specified Windows Desktop settings.
member.param: XMessageBoxBackground enumeration member.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.LoadBackColorFromSolidColor(XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxBackground,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Paints dialog's background using a solid color based on a Color object.
member.param: XMessageBoxBackground enumeration member.
A Color object.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.LoadBackColorFromSolidColor(XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxBackground,System.Int32)
member.summary: Paints dialog's background using a solid color based on RGB value.
member.param: XMessageBoxBackground enumeration member.
RGB value.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.LoadBackColorFromSolidColor(XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxBackground,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Paints dialog's background using a solid color based on three channel values.
member.param: XMessageBoxBackground enumeration member.
Red channel.
Green channel.
Blue channel.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.LoadBackcolorFromSystemColor(XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxBackground,System.Int32)
member.summary: Paints dialog's background with a system color specified by a system color index.
member.remarks: For a list of System Color Index values open MSDN page describing GetSysColor API function. http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms724371(VS.85).aspx
member.param: XMessageBoxBackground enumeration member.
System Color index value.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.LoadBackcolorFromHatchBrush(XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxBackground,XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxHatchStyle,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Paints dialog's background using a hatch brush as a pattern. Specifies a hatch style and brushe's color based on a Color object.
member.remarks: For a list of Hatch styles open MSDN description for CreateHatchBrush API function. http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd183504(VS.85).aspx
member.param: XMessageBoxBackground enumeration member.
Hatch style value.
A Color object.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.LoadBackcolorFromHatchBrush(XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxBackground,XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxHatchStyle,System.Int32)
member.summary: Paints dialog's background using a hatch brush as a pattern. Specifies a hatch style and brushe's color as RGB value.
member.remarks: For a list of Hatch styles open MSDN description for CreateHatchBrush API function. http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd183504(VS.85).aspx
member.param: XMessageBoxBackground enumeration member.
Hatch style value.
RGB value.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.LoadBackcolorFromHatchBrush(XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxBackground,XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxHatchStyle,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Paints dialog's background using a hatch brush as a pattern. Specifies a hatch style and brushe's color as three color channels.
member.remarks: For a list of Hatch styles open MSDN description for CreateHatchBrush API function. http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd183504(VS.85).aspx
member.param: XMessageBoxBackground enumeration member.
Hatch style value.
Red channel.
Green channel.
Blue channel.

member.summary: Paints specified dialog's background using a bitmap file as a pattern.

The full path to a bitmap file.

HBRUSH handle.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.AddWebLinkToIcon
member.summary: When called with no parameters, removes web link from the dialog icon.

member.summary: Click on the dialog icon opens the specified URL in the default browser.
member.param: The URL of a resource to display in default browser when the dialog icon is clicked.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.AddWebLinkToMessage
member.summary: When called with no parameters, removes web link from the dialog message.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.AddWebLinkToMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Click on the dialog message opens the specified URL in the default browser.
member.param: The URL of a resource to display in default browser when the dialog message is clicked.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.EnableHrefCtrl(System.String)
member.summary: Sets HRef control to appear on the dialog linked to specified URL.
member.param: The URL of a resource to display in default browser when the HRef control is clicked.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.EnableHrefCtrl(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets HRef control to appear on the dialog linked to specified URL and alias.
member.param: The URL of a resource to display in default browser when the HRef control is clicked.
A caption to be displayed instead of a URL.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.EnableHrefCtrl(System.String,System.String,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Sets HRef control to appear on the dialog linked to specified URL and alias. The text color is based on a Color object.
member.param: The URL of a resource to display in default browser when the HRef control is clicked.
A caption to be displayed instead of a URL.
Specifies the text color for the control.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.EnableHrefCtrl(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets HRef control to appear on the dialog linked to specified URL and alias. The text color is based on RGB value.
member.param: The URL of a resource to display in default browser when the HRef control is clicked.
A caption to be displayed instead of a URL.
Specifies the text color for the control.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.EnableCheckBoxCtrl
member.summary: Sets Check Box control not to appear on the dialog (no input parameters).

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.EnableCheckBoxCtrl(System.String)
member.summary: Sets Check Box control to appear on the dialog, and specifies control's caption.
member.param: Control's caption.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.EnableCheckBoxCtrl(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets Check Box control to appear on the dialog, and specifies control's caption and check state.
member.param: Control's caption.
Control's initial Checked status.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.EnableTextInputCtrl
member.summary: Sets Text Input control not to appear on the dialog (no input parameters).

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.EnableTextInputCtrl(System.String)
member.summary: Sets Text Input control to appear on the dialog. Specifies control's caption.
member.remarks: The width, the length, and the style (single-line) of the text box control will be set to default values.
member.param: A prompt to be displayed above Text Box control.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.EnableTextInputCtrl(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets Text Input control to appear on the dialog. Specifies control's caption and the width of the text box.
member.param: A prompt to be displayed above Text Box control.
The width of the text box in pixels.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.EnableTextInputCtrl(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets Text Input control to appear on the dialog. Specifies control's caption, the width and the height of the text box.
member.param: A prompt to be displayed above Text Box control.
The width of the text box in pixels.
The height of the text box in pixels.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.EnableTextInputCtrl(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets Text Input control to appear on the dialog. Specifies control's caption, the width and the height of the text box, and control style (Int).
member.param: A prompt to be displayed above Text Box control.
The width of the text box in pixels.
The height of the text box in pixels.
A combination of XMessageBoxEditControlStyles enumeration members.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.EnableTextInputCtrl(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxEditControlStyles)
member.summary: Sets Text Input control to appear on the dialog. Specifies control's caption, the width and the height of the text box, and control style (enumeration).
member.param: A prompt to be displayed above Text Box control.
The width of the text box in pixels.
The height of the text box in pixels.
A combination of XMessageBoxEditControlStyles enumeration members.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.EnableTextInputCtrl(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Sets Text Input control to appear on the dialog. Specifies control's caption, the width and the height of the text box, control style, and default value.
member.param: A prompt to be displayed above Text Box control.
The width of the text box in pixels.
The height of the text box in pixels.
A value representing control style for the text box (ES_ constants).
A default value to be put in the text box control.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.AssignDlgMaxSize
member.summary: The maximum size of the dialog window is restricted only by the size of the active monitor.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.AssignDlgMaxSize(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the maximum width for the dialog window. The height is restricted only by the height of the active monitor.
member.remarks: Positive value set the upper limit. Negative value forces the dimension to that absolute value. Screen dimensions have precedence. There are lower limits, the dialog dimensions cannot drop below.
member.param: Maximum width of the dialog window in pixels.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.AssignDlgMaxSize(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the maximum size for the dialog window based on a width, and a height.
member.remarks: Positive value set the upper limit. Negative value forces the dimension to that absolute value. Screen dimensions have precedence. There are lower limits, the dialog dimensions cannot drop below.
member.param: Maximum width of the dialog window in pixels.
Maximum height of the dialog window in pixels.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.AssignDlgPosition
member.summary: The dialog will be centered on the active monitor. This is the default setting.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.AssignDlgPosition(XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxHorizontalAlign,XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxVerticalAlign)
member.summary: Aligns the dialog to the screen borders based on horizontal and vertical alignment constants.
member.remarks: With multiple monitors, the positioning coordinates are relative to the active monitor.
member.param: XMessageBoxHorizontalAlign enumeration.
XMessageBoxVerticalAlign enumeration.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.AssignDlgPosition(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Specifies the distance between the left top corner of the dialog and the left corner edge of the active monitor.
member.remarks: With multiple monitors, the positioning coordinates are relative to the active monitor.
member.param: Distance between the left edge of the dialog and the left edge of the active monitor.
Distance between the top edge of the dialog and the top edge of the active monitor.

member.name: M:XMsgLib.Dlg.DlgMgr.AssignDlgPosition(System.Int32,System.Int32,XMsgLib.Dlg.XMessageBoxPositionMode)
member.summary: Specifies the distance between the left top corner of the dialog and the left corner edge of the active monitor.
member.remarks: With multiple monitors, the positioning coordinates are relative to the active monitor.
member.param: XMessageBoxHorizontalAlign enumeration or distance between the left edge of the dialog and the left edge of the active monitor.
XMessageBoxVerticalAlign enumeration or distance between the top edge of the dialog and the top edge of the active monitor.
XMessageBoxPositionMode enumeration.

member.summary: Gets or sets the MessageBox monitor status. With the monitor on, the assembly adjusts regular MessageBox calls on the fly.

member.summary: Returns True when the dialog has been closed on timeout. Read-only.

member.summary: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds for the MessageBox to be displayed without input from the keyboard or the mouse.
